author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: LupintheThird.com
body:
I'm considering lending out my domain name and content
to someone who can take care of it for a couple years,
or merge it with their current material.

I'm thinking of either David or Luis/Bruce for the
job, since I trust them. If you guys could get in
contact with me, maybe something could be arranged if
you're interested.


=====
"Arsene Lupin III"
webmaster@lupinthethird.nospam.com
(Remove "nospam" to reply)
http://www.LupintheThird.com
